languages.text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used in combat by any character, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next attack will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда любой персонаж в бою использует {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, следующая атака {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g} не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used in combat by any character, the Leader's next attack will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used in combat by any character, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next attack will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used in combat by any character, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next attack will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: Wird im Kampf von einem beliebigen Charakter eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} eingesetzt, kostet der nächste Angriff des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziers{/g} 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used in combat by any character, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next attack will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} im Kampf von einem beliebigen Charakter genutzt wird, kostet der nächste Angriff des Anführers 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un personnage a recours à un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} au combat, l'attaque suivante de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used in combat by any character, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next attack will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un personnage a recours à un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} au combat, l'attaque suivante du Leader ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

Chaque fois qu'un personnage a recours à un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} au combat, l'attaque suivante du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Leader{/g} ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: Cuando cualquier personaje usa un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} en combate, el siguiente ataque del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used in combat by any character, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next attack will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando cualquier personaje usa un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} en combate, el siguiente ataque del líder cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: 当任意角色在战斗中使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}的下次攻击不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used in combat by any character, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next attack will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当任意角色在战斗中使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}时，领袖的下次攻击不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: 戦闘中に{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}がいずれかのキャラクターによって使用されるたびに、その{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}の次の攻撃のコストは0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}となる。
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used in combat by any character, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next attack will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中に{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}がいずれかのキャラクターによって使用されるたびに、そのリーダーの次の攻撃のコストは0{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}となる。

languages.text: Когда любой персонаж в бою использует {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, следующая атака {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g} не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used in combat by any character, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next attack will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда любой персонаж в бою использует {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, следующая атака лидера не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
Когда любой персонаж в бою использует {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, следующая атака лидера не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

languages.text: Çatışmada herhangi bir karakter tarafından {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} kullanıldığında {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g}'ın bir sonraki saldırısı 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used in combat by any character, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next attack will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
